titleInfo.title: Gerald Purcell and Associates Job No. 38421

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2986) for an order placed by Gerald Purcell and Associates for 200 one color window cards for a performance by Eddie Arnold at the Madison County Coliseum in Huntsville, Alabama on June 17. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
